scripts.build_server_script: cd o2server && mvn clean && mvn install
scripts.build_parallel: npm run build_server && npm run build_web
scripts.typeInfor: type welcome && echo Your server is build success: target/o2server/
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy
scripts.build:win: npm run clear && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:win
scripts.build:linux: npm run clear  && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:linux
scripts.build:aix: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:aix
scripts.build:arm: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:arm
scripts.build:macos: npm run clear  && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:macos
scripts.build:risc: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:risc
scripts.build:rpi: npm run clear &&  npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:rpi
scripts.build_ci: npm run clear && npm run preperation && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy
scripts.build_ci:win: npm run clear && npm run preperation:win && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:win
scripts.build_ci:linux: npm run clear && npm run preperation:linux && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:linux
scripts.build_ci:aix: npm run clear && npm run preperation:aix && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:aix
scripts.build_ci:arm: npm run clear && npm run preperation:arm && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:arm
scripts.build_ci:macos: npm run clear && npm run preperation:macos && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:macos
scripts.build_ci:risc: npm run clear && npm run preperation:risc && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:risc
scripts.build_ci:rpi: npm run clear && npm run preperation:rpi && npm run build_parallel && npm run deploy:rpi
